reviews.text: 2000 Old Witt Rd, Frisco, TX 75036 Our recent customers in Richardson wanted a backyard space that felt like a true escape, and their new detached patio cover delivers exactly that. We custom designed and built a full-finish structure that stands beautifully on its own while still feeling connected to the home.
